synopsis.text:
Meanwhile in the bustling city of Tokyo, a middle-aged man named Suzuki leads a mundane life running a petite business. Craving fame and aspiring to grace the cover of a popular magazine, Suzuki's life takes an unexpected turn when he stumbles upon a peculiar entrance leading to an alien realm.

In this new world, he encounters goblins and cleverly enslaves them using control devices, forcing them to bend to his every whim. Drunk on power, Suzuki exploits the goblins and delves into a life of evil.

However, two intelligent students, Hajime and his girlfriend Mariko, cross paths with an enigmatic alien detective who bestows upon them extraordinary Doteraman suits. Donning these suits, they transform into superheroes Doteraman and Doterapink, vowing to combat the tyranny of the wicked ruler.

As the duo fights for justice and liberates the oppressed goblins, they embark on thrilling adventures filled with excitement, entertainment, and pleasure. Will they succeed in putting an end to Suzuki's malevolent deeds? Only time will tell.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
